bioconda.name: blobtoolkit
bioconda.summary: Interactive quality assessment of genome assemblies.

biotools.summary: BlobToolKit Viewer is a genome-scale dataset visualistion tool developed as part of the blobtoolkit project to allow browser-based identification and filtering of target and non-target data in genome assemblies.

bioschemas.name: BlobToolKit
bioschemas.summary: BlobToolKit Viewer is a genome-scale dataset visualistion tool developed as part of the blobtoolkit project to allow browser-based identification and filtering of target and non-target data in genome assemblies.

galaxy.summary: Identification and isolation non-target data in draft and publicly available genome assemblies.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: BlobToolKit Viewer is a genome-scale dataset visualistion tool developed as part of the blobtoolkit project to allow browser-based identification and filtering of target and non-target data in genome assemblies.
